page.title: 02DOUNBY AGRICULTURAL SHOW
page.content: The{Dounby Show}is one of the main events that happens in our area. It is held in August at the Show Park. At the Show all kinds of things happen. People from the West Mainland come to show off their{cattle, sheep and {other animals.}There are also tractors and farm implements on display. There are sideshows and stalls where you can win or buy things such as chips, candy floss, sugary doughrings and melons. There is also a beer tent where most people crowd on a hot day. At night there is a parade when trailers and floats go round with people on them dressed up in funny clothes. There is a prize for the best or funniest one. There is a happy atmosphere at the Show and I would recommend it to anyone.
